title: Unsatisfied dependency
body: ### cant build jandex hello friends, would you please have a look at my dependency injection problem. Quarkus cant find the bean. CDI works if i take the copy from the same modul. i have added the sub-modul to jandex these combinations have been tried: quarkus.index-dependency.adapters.artifact-id=adapters quarkus.index-dependency.adapters.artifact-id=driver.adapters quarkus.index-dependency.adapters.artifact-id=:drivers:adapters: ``` quarkus.index-dependency.adapters.artifact-id=adapters quarkus.index-dependency.adapters.group-id=de.db.vendo.prototype.buchung.reservation ``` ``` 2024-01-29 22:37:40,144 WARN [io.qua.hib.orm.dep.HibernateOrmProcessor] (build-2) Hibernate ORM is disabled because no JPA entities were found 2024-01-29 22:37:40,144 INFO [io.qua.hib.orm.dep.dev.HibernateOrmDevServicesProcessor] (build-20) Setting quarkus.hibernate-orm.database.generation=drop-and-create to initialize Dev Services managed database 2024-01-29 22:37:40,166 ERROR [io.qua.dep.dev.IsolatedDevModeMain] (vert.x-worker-thread-1) Failed to start quarkus: java.lang.RuntimeException: io.quarkus.builder.BuildException: Build failure: Build failed due to errors [error]: Build step io.quarkus.arc.deployment.ArcProcessor#validate threw an exception: jakarta.enterprise.inject.spi.DeploymentException: jakarta.enterprise.inject.UnsatisfiedResolutionException: Unsatisfied dependency for type de.db.vendo.prototype.buchung.reservation.divers.adapters.submit.boundary.SubmitReservationResourceAdapter and qualifiers [@Default] - java member: [types=[de.db.vendo.prototype.buchung.reservation.divers.web.submit.boundary.SubmitReservationResource, java.lang.Object], qualifiers=[@Default, @Any],
